Class B3RaycastInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.bullet.B3RaycastInformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class B3RaycastInformation
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct b3RaycastInformation {
     int m_numRayHits;
     struct b3RayHitInfo * m_rayHits;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • B3RaycastInformation

        public B3RaycastInformation​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a B3RaycastInformation instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
